name: ''The Razorbax : Something To Believe In'' (ships worldwide!)
description:
Something To Believe In
Release Date : 15/03/2010
''A 12 track bombshell of pure honesty and rock 'n' roll!
The songs range from melodic epics like ''Don't'' and 'Couldn't Wait'' to 2 minute rage filled snarls such as ''Wake Up! Wake Up!'' and ''Stupid Boy!''. Not forgetting the incredibly radio friendly acoustic ballad ''Better Place''. There is even a reggae meets punk rock anthem for the summer ''Shot Down''. This record could well cement The Razorbax position as 1 of the most important and best UK acts of the decade!'' 9/10 - overplay.com

Buy the CD and give yourself ''Something To Believe In'' for just Â£7!!!

***PLEASE NOTE!!! Due to high pre-sale demand for this item your order may not arrive until after 23rd March 2010.
